output.sentences: As of last night, I am officially a graduate of UTC!
My mom made sure to get me a pamphlet that had been handed out to the guests.
I sat in a big auditorium with hundreds of other graduates.
My friend had actually completed her Masters' Degree in Computer Science!
Me however, I am Dr. Johnson, a graduate of medical school!
